articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.arweave.dev | nader.lens 🧢
How to build censorship-resistant software
- Deploy immutable, permanent front ends on @ArweaveTeam 
- Push your code to @radicle 
- Build APIs on @graphprotocol network
- Store files on @ArweaveTeam or IPFS
- @Livepeer video streams
And run your own node(s)

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.arweave.dev | nader.lens 🧢
Still blown away whenever I see someone with @developer_dao in their Twitter bio, mention it in their talk, create DAO a meetup somewhere around the world, or post a pic wearing swag.
Almost 1 year later & we're stronger than ever 🙇‍♂️❤️
Thanks to everyone who helped get us here.
dhai.eth: everytime i see someone mention @developer_dao in their bio in their slides at confs i wanna cry 😭 we went from nothing in september last year to now having talented members repping us around the world. i'm so lucky that i can call D_D home
articles.title: RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.arweave.dev | nader.lens 🧢: Still blown away whenever I see someone with @developer_dao in their Twitter bio, mention...

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT DKH ✍️🦇🔊
Excited to publish my first blog post for @developer_dao 🎉🙌🏽😄
If you’re curious about crypto and blockchain technology this is a 3 minute intro that is easy to digest without any previous knowledge.
Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): A Quick Intro to Crypto✨
by @developer_dao member @danielkhunter 
Crypto comes from the Greek word kryptós (κρυπτός), and means "hidden" or "to hide," and graphy comes from the Greek word gráphein (γράφειν) means "to write." 📜
 https://blog.developerdao.com/a-quick-intro-to-crypto
articles.title: RT DKH ✍️🦇🔊: Excited to publish my first blog post for @developer_dao 🎉🙌🏽😄 If you’re curious about crypto and blockchain technolo...

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT 🐘🔗 sam.arweave.dev
Recently, a helpful community website -- 
Fortunately, there was a copy on the permaweb.
Now it has a permanent Arweave name: 
Permaweb apps don't fail you when you need them.
ArNS > DNS.
siegfried.arweave.dev 🐘 🎈 🧬: @samecwilliams @benjileibo The Arweave Fees calculator now has a short and easy to remember ArNS address: 
H/T to the builder of the permapage, who is not me and whom I do not know.
 http://ar-fees.arweave.dev
